title: How much unused voice over do champions usually have?
body: I dont know why voice over intrests me alot but it does so i makes me sad to know that many champions have alot of unused vo and i was wonder why and how much is unused

replies.body:
Depends on the champ.  Most have a little cut out of the final record.  Maybe 5% to 10% of  the lines.    
Jhin was sorta an epic-- because of production timeline issues we intentionally tried to cover all bases.  So probably 30% of his recorded VO never saw the light of day-- including the extremely disturbing haikus (sob) which were recorded for his recalls.
Can riot release the unused voice lines? I would definitely love to hear what champions would said.

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=lJ5ErAYE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-18T00:29:41.660+0000)
>
> Depends on the champ.  Most have a little cut out of the final record.  Maybe 5% to 10% of  the lines.    
> Jhin was sorta an epic-- because of production timeline issues we intentionally tried to cover all bases.  So probably 30% of his recorded VO never saw the light of day-- including the extremely disturbing haikus (sob) which were recorded for his recalls.

Well then, could you at least release some of them? that would be awesome for those that want to hear them.

yeah i heard this on some riot jihn video and they said theres like 10 minutes of unused vo for him and thats crazy. Just wondering why do some older champs have cut vo from base but then lets say in the project skins leona and fiora have a extra line or two
would there be any chance/way these could find their way back to Jhin? or have they been Silenced forever?

DUDE
You guys should totally release some of the unused lines in a segment, do like an article or story about what goes into voice recording. I would love to hear the unused lines mostly from Kindred, Jhin, Tahm Klench, and Kled honestly.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} 

RIOT PLS

Any chance of releasing some of these
I wanna here more of Tahm Kench's 10/10 "sick burns"
